original_title: Il Pranzo di Natale a casa di Cesare Zavattini
overview: Mario Soldati accompanies us once again, after the journey in the Po valley, in search of genuine foods, this time to discover the culinary traditions of Christmas lunch. Cesare Zavattini tells about the typical Christmas dishes of his region. The broadcast aired on December 17, 1958.
title: Il Pranzo di Natale a casa di Cesare Zavattini
